snippet: Celebrities and noncelebrities often live in close proximity in New York. What, if anything, do you say to a famous person who lives in your building?
abstract: Celebrities and noncelebrities often live in close proximity in New York City, sometimes in the same apartment building or on the same floor, which can occasionally lead to awkward interactions.
lead_paragraph: Celebrities and noncelebrities often live in close proximity in New York. What, if anything, do you say to a famous person who lives in your building?

headline.seo: In New York, Stargazing in the Elevator
